summary: Makes the Gauldur Amulet have a useful enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
This also incorporates the clipping fix from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6431/]deLooney's mod[/url]. Since it was as simple as switching out a model, i figured i'd include that. So thanks to deLooney for pointing out the issue!

The enchantment in the original was really... disappointing. Cool questline that has you reforging an ancient amulet and going all over skyrim! +30 health, magicka, and stamina? Ugh. Talk about a letdown. So i just gave it a couple small buffs to make it viable even into later levels.

The new enchantment is:
50 health, magicka, and stamina
10% health, magicka, and stamina regen
10% magic resistance
5% reduced spell cost
author: morganmarz
